text.__SUMMARY__: The cinnamon dog-faced bat (Cynomops abrasus), is a South American bat species of the family Molossidae. It is found in northern Argentina, Bolivia, Brazil, Colombia, Ecuador, French Guiana, Guyana, Peru, Paraguay, Suriname and Venezuela.
text.References: Eger, Judith L. (1 March 2008).  Gardner, Alfred L. (ed.). Mammals of South America, Volume 1: Marsupials, Xenarthrans, Shrews, and Bats. University of Chicago Press. pp. 403–404. ISBN 978-0-226-28240-4. OCLC 644361912.
